|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Winbond;W632GG6KB-12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :;Models *DZS ZNID-GE-2428A1 *DZS ZNID-GPON-2428A1
CE compliance cerfications has been obtained for the following equipment: *GPON 4 Port WiFi Gateway :•ZNID-GPON-2408A1 (-XX/-NYY/-XX-NYY) :•ZNID-GPON-2424A1 (-XX/-NYY/-XX-NYY) :•ZNID-GPON-2426A1 (-XX/-NYY/-XX-NYY) :•ZNID-GPON-2428A1 (-XX/-NYY/-XX-NYY) *GE 4 Port WiFi Gateway :•ZNID-GE-2408A1 (-XX/-NYY/-XX-NYY) :•ZNID-GE-2424A1 (-XX/-NYY/-XX-NYY) :•ZNID-GE-2426A1 (-XX/-NYY/-XX-NYY) :•ZNID-GE-2408A1 (-XX/-NYY/-XX-NYY)
:Note: -XX = NA, EU, UK, SG
===Specifications=== Model Description :;GPON *ZNID-GPON-2408A1 • GPON Uplink, 4 GigE, 1x USB port :2x2 2.4GHz 802.11bgn, 3x3 5.8GHz 802.11an/ac *ZNID-GPON-2424A1 • GPON Uplink, 2 POTS, 4 GigE *ZNID-GPON-2426A1 • GPON Uplink, 2 POTS, 4 GigE, 1x USB port :2x2 2.4GHz 802.11bgn *ZNID-GPON-2428A1 • GPON Uplink, 2 POTS, 4 GigE, 1x USB port :2x2 2.4GHz 802.11bgn, 3x3 5.8GHz 802.11an/ac
:;GE *ZNID-GE-2408A1 • GE Uplink, 4 GigE, 1x USB port :2x2 2.4GHz 802.11bgn, 3x3 5.8GHz 802.11an/ac *ZNID-GE-2424A1 • GE Uplink, 2 POTS, 4 GigE *ZNID-GE-2426A1 • GE Uplink, 2 POTS, 4 GigE, 1x USB port :2x2 2.4GHz 802.11bgn *ZNID-GE-2428A1 • GE Uplink, 2 POTS, 4 GigE, 1x USB port :2x2 2.4GHz 802.11bgn, 3x3 5.8GHz 802.11an/ac
